column1: Programming: Lui Martinez Laskowski and Yuri N. Martinez Laskowski
The following libre works were used in the creation of this project:
[color=#FFA500]"Mountain at Dusk Background" by ansimuz (Luis Zuno)[/color]
[color=#FFA500]"Chaingun, Pistol, Rifle, Shotgun Shots" by Michel Baradari[/color]
